posts.post_content:
Hey look- they printed a [Tinker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tinker)-belle.   
  
(I'm kind of shocked noone else seems to have thought of that yet, lol.)  
  
But seriously, far more obviously and blatantly broken than Jace, who was merely obviously and blatantly great, but difficult to fully break with the genious way that Wizards has (up til now) executed on making the whole Planeswalker card-type inherently powerful, yet also inherently fair.  
  
Tinkerbelle, on the other hand, should have destroyed Standard right out of the gates. Her story is really a hell of a lot more like old scary cards that we look back and think 'Wizards did WHAT?!' and then we read Tournament Reports from the Era and think 'wait, it took them HOW LONG to stop calling that card crap?' Just shows that for a while there definitely was a completely valid complain of power-creep in the game, from Faeries to Jund to Valakut and that Stoneforge was, at first, 'leveling the playing field.' It almost pains to me to even think that sentence,... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

Tinkerbelle, on the other hand, should have destroyed Standard right out of the gates. Her story is really a hell of a lot more like old scary cards that we look back and think 'Wizards did WHAT?!' and then we read Tournament Reports from the Era and think 'wait, it took them HOW LONG to stop calling that card crap?' Just shows that for a while there definitely was a completely valid complain of power-creep in the game, from Faeries to Jund to Valakut and that Stoneforge was, at first, 'leveling the playing field.' Posted By: Arachibutyrophobia (8/17/2011 1:04:06 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Oh hey there, centrepiece of the most hated deck in my play circle.  
  
CAW Blade needs to die. Seriously. And this card along with it.   
  
"Hey guys, lets print a card that searches for equipment and lets you play them for 2!"  
"Sweet, love it!"  
  
few months later...  
  
"Hey guys, I was looking over Scars block, and I noticed that we have a lot of powerful equipments planned. What about that Stoneforge thing we printed in Worldwake?"  
"nah, forget about it. Players are too silly to remember that piece of crap."  
  
Why, Wizards, why would you make a block with powerful equipment after printing something like this?  
  
/rant  
  
EDIT: Wootwoot. Turns out she was good enough to save WoTC finding the banhammer by doing it herself xD
posts.html:
Oh hey there, centrepiece of the most hated deck in my play circle.

CAW Blade needs to die. Seriously. And this card along with it.

"Hey guys, lets print a card that searches for equipment and lets you play them for 2!"
"Sweet, love it!"

few months later...

"Hey guys, I was looking over Scars block, and I noticed that we have a lot of powerful equipments planned. What about that Stoneforge thing we printed in Worldwake?"
"nah, forget about it. Players are too silly to remember that piece of crap."

Why, Wizards, why would you make a block with powerful equipment after printing something like this?

/rant

EDIT: Wootwoot. Turns out she was good enough to save WoTC finding the banhammer by doing it herself xD
